DOC.brief_summary: Participants train The Micheli Center Sports Injury Prevention , undergo test muscular strength , range motion , flexibility , aerobic capacity muscular endurance . They complete train certify trainer injury prevention specialist specific goal meet . Upon completion training , fill injury questionnaire every three month five ten year .
DOC.brief_title: Analytic , Prospective Cohort Study Athletes Enrolled Exercise Training Intervention
DOC.criteria: Males , Females , age 6 young 6 year old
